name: Sinners
location: 63 Newgate St, City Centre, Newcastle upon Tyne
description: Probably the best trebles bar in the toon, £1.95 trebles for Students Sun-Thurs!

name: Basement
location: 118 Grey St, City Centre, Newcastle upon Tyne
description: Cheap and cheerful, very empty most nights but packed on Saturday. £5 for 3 trebles!

name: Gotham Town
location: Gunner House, Neville St, Newcastle upon Tyne
description: Great alternative trebles bar if you can hack the strong taste of the trebles. 2 for £5 Trebles/Cocktails if you're a student

name: Empress
description: Decent small trebles bar, can get busy at peak times (9pm-11pm). Pricey on weekends, but £6.95 for 3 trebles during the week with a student card

name: Bijoux
description: Very small trebles bar, frequented by Geordie Shore. Very expensive on weekends, but decent student offers Monday to Friday

name: Easy Street
location: 8-10 Westmorland Rd, City Centre, Newcastle upon Tyne
description: LGBT-friendly bar, open late and popular with locals. Trebles vary depending on mixer, but house spirit + coke should be around £3.50

name: Rustys
location: Unit 3&4 International Centre for Life, Times Square,, Newcastle upon Tyne
description: LGBT-friendly bar that's popular with both students and locals. Expect to pay £4 for a treble and it's right next to Digital!

name: Players
location: The Gate, Newgate St Newcastle upon Tyne
description: Large trebles bar based in The Gate, cheap during the week, expensive on the weekend
